Name: clean
Description: Delete, deprecate, prune, or otherwise remove files

Name: config
Description: Change to build configs, scripts, or external dependencies

Name: extern
Description: Update due to external API or other changes

Name: lint
Description: Lint or other warning clean up

Name: refactor
Description: Improve structure or format of code

Name: seo
Description: SEO improvements, A/B tests, or other changes

Name: typo
Description: Fix typos, whitespace, or cosmetic change

Name: version
Description: Simple marker to tag a version bump

Name: wip
Description: Mark the beginning of a major change to code
